snippet: A temporary shelter set up by the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals after Hurricane Sandy has provided care for longer than planned, but pet owners have been told the facility is closing.
abstract: A temporary shelter set up by the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals after Hurricane Sandy has provided care for longer than planned, but pet owners have been told the facility is closing.

headline.main: Time's Fleeting for Storm-Displaced Pets' Free Care

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
